00038                 private function reinit()
00039                 {
00040                         // load global config file or die
00041                         if (!file_exists("./config.controller.php"))
00042                                 {
00043                                         die("config file 'config.controller.php' not found!");
00044                                 }
00045                         else if (!__check_syntax("./config.controller.php"))
00046                                 {
00047                                         die("config file 'config.controller.php' is invalid!");
00048                                 }
00049                         else
00050                                 {
00051                                         __session_start();
00052                                         include("./config.controller.php");
00053                                         $_SESSION["_Action"]         = "";
00054                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"]         = "";
00055                                         $_SESSION["_ErrNo"]          = "";
00056                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = "";
00057                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"]    = "";
00058                                         $_SESSION["_SqlType"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][0])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][0] : false;
00059                                         $_SESSION["_TimeOut"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][1])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][1] : 300;
00060                                         $_SESSION["_Cookies"]        = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][2])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][2] : false;
00061                                         $_SESSION["_Webmaster"]      = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][3])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][3] : "webmaster@localhost";
00062                                         $_SESSION["_Domain"]         = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][4])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][4] : "localhost";
00063                                         $_SESSION["_MaxWorkingH"]    = (isset($_SETTINGS["Main"][5])) ? $_SETTINGS["Main"][5] : 8;
00064                                         $_SESSION["_TplSqlTable"]    = (isset($_SETTINGS["Template"][3])) ? $_SETTINGS["Template"][3] : false;
00065                                 }
00066 
00067                         // try to register needed objects for current session or die
00068                         try
00069                                 {
00070                                         $this->register("Memory",array(),"MEMORY");
00071 
00072                                         $this->register("Timer",array("Controller",true),"TIMER.PHP");
00073                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.PHP"]->reset();
00074                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.PHP"]->start();
00075 
00076                                         $this->register("MySql", $_SETTINGS["MySql"], "MYSQL");
00077                                         $_SESSION["TIMER.MYSQL"]->reset();
00078 
00079                                         $this->register("Template", $_SETTINGS["Template"], "HTML");
00080                                         $this->register("Session",  array(), "CLIENT");
00081                                 }
00082                         catch (Exception $e)
00083                                 {
00084                                         die($e->getMessage());
00085                                 }
00086                 }

00110                 protected function register($classname, $parameters = array(), $alias = "")
00111                 {
00112                         if ($alias != "" && ! isset($_SESSION[$alias]))
00113                                 {
00114                                         $_SESSION[$alias] =& new $classname($parameters);
00115                                 }
00116                         else if (! isset($_SESSION[$classname]) && $alias == "")
00117                                 {
00118                                         $_SESSION[$classname] =& new $classname($parameters);
00119                                 }
00120                 }
00121 
00132                 protected function unregister($classname, $alias = "")
00133                 {
00134                         if (isset($_SESSION[$classname]))
00135                                 {
00136                                         unset($_SESSION[$classname]);
00137                                 }
00138                         if ($alias != "" && isset($_SESSION[$alias]))
00139                                 {
00140                                         unset($_SESSION[$alias]);
00141                                 }
00142                 }

00165                 public function create_menu()
00166                 {
00167                         if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_user())
00168                                 {
00169                                         // no menu for guests!!
00170                                         return;
00171                                 }
00172                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Abmelden", "./?action=logout", "Q");
00173                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_spacer();
00174                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("&Uuml;bersicht", "./?page=home", "H", ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]=="home"));
00175                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Mitarbeiter", "./?page=users", "E", ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]=="users"));
00176                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("Einstellungen", "./?page=setup", "E", ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]=="setup"));
00177                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_spacer();
00178                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("[<u>KOMMEN</u>]", "./?action=book&amp;id=1", "K");
00179                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->menu_insert_entry("[<u>GEHEN</u>]", "./?action=book&amp;id=0", "G");
00180                 }

00189                 public function create_page()
00190                 {
00191                         if (! $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->is_user())
00192                                 {
00193                                         if ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"] == "passwd")
00194                                                 {
00195                                                         // load template
00196                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->load("passwd.html");
00197                                                         // send page to browser
00198                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("passwd.html");
00199                                                 }
00200                                         else
00201                                                 {
00202                                                         // load template
00203                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->load("login.html");
00204                                                         // send page to browser
00205                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("login.html");
00206                                                 }
00207                                 }
00208                         else
00209                                 {
00210                                         switch ($_SESSION["_PageID.current"])
00211                                                 {
00212                                                 case "users":
00213                                                         $this->show_user_table();
00214                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("users.html");
00215                                                         break;
00216                                                 case "setup":
00217                                                         $select = array("-1" => "");
00218                                                         $edit   = array("name1" => "", "name2" => "", "pass" => "");
00219 
00220                                                         $query  = "SELECT mid, email FROM tr_users ORDER BY email;";
00221                                                         $array  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00222 
00223                                                         // reformat array for creating select menu
00224                                                         foreach($array as $key => $value)
00225                                                         {
00226                                                                 $select[$value["mid"]] = $value["email"];
00227                                                         }
00228 
00229                                                         // check for selected item
00230                                                         $selected = "";
00231                                                         if (isset($_POST["edit_mid"]))
00232                                                                 {
00233                                                                         $selected = $_POST["edit_mid"];
00234                                                                         if ($_POST["submit"] == "LADEN")
00235                                                                                 {
00236                                                                                         $query  = "SELECT * FROM tr_users WHERE mid='$selected';";
00237                                                                                         $array  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00238                                                                                         $edit["name1"] = $array[0]["firstname"];
00239                                                                                         $edit["name2"] = $array[0]["lastname"];
00240                                                                                 }
00241                                                                         else if ($_POST["submit"] == "SPEICHERN")
00242                                                                                 {
00243 
00244                                                                                 }
00245                                                                 }
00246 
00247                                                         $options = $_SESSION["HTML"]->create_select($select, $selected);
00248                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_FIRSTNAME}}", $edit["name1"]);
00249                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_LASTNAME}}",  $edit["name2"]);
00250                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "{{EDIT_PASSWORD}}",  $edit["pass"]);
00251                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("setup.html", "<!--USER_SELECT-->", $options);
00252 
00253                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->output("setup.html");
00254                                                         break;
00255                                                 case "home":
00256                                                 default:
00257                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--MID-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]);
00258                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--FIRST_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["firstname"]);
00259                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--LAST_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["lastname"]);
00260                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--LOGIN_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["email"]);
00261                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--IP-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["ip"]);
00262                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--GROUP_NAME-->", $_SESSION["_UserData"]["groupname"]);
00263 
00264                                                         // list last bookings
00265                                                         $this->show_last_bookings();
00266 
00267                                                         // summary calculation and assignment for current week and month
00268                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("WEEK");
00269                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_WEEK_NOW-->",$array["Stunden"]);
00270                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "{{SUM_WEEK_NOW_TL}}",$array["Von"]." - ".$array["Bis"]);
00271                                                         $array = $this->get_booking_sums("MONTH");
00272                                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--SUM_MONTH_NOW-->",$array["Stunden"]);

00297                 public function prepare_templates()
00298                 {
00299                         if (! isset($_SESSION["_cached"]) || ! $_SESSION["_cached"])
00300                                 {
00301                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->import();
00302                                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->preload();
00303                                         $_SESSION["_cached"] = true;
00304                                 }

00306 
00320                 protected function get_booking_sums($range = "DAY", $offset = 0, $limit = 1)
00321                 {
00322                         $group = "";
00323                         $start = "";
00324                         $stop  = "";
00325                         $redat = "";
00326                         switch (strtoupper($range))
00327                                 {
00328                                 case "YEAR":
00329                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset YEAR )";
00330                                         $start = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '01.01.%Y' )";
00331                                         $stop  = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '31.12.%Y' )";
00332                                         $group = "%Y";
00333                                         $range = "SameYear";
00334                                         break;
00335                                 case "MONTH":
00336                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset MONTH )";
00337                                         $start = "DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '%Y-%m-01' )";
00338                                         $stop  = "LAST_DAY( $redat )";
00339                                         $group = "%m";
00340                                         $range = "SameMonth";
00341                                         break;
00342                                 case "WEEK":
00343                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset WEEK )";
00344                                         $start = "DATE_SUB( $redat, INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK( $redat ) - 2 DAY )";
00345                                         $stop  = "DATE_SUB( $redat, INTERVAL DAYOFWEEK( $redat ) - 8 DAY )";
00346                                         $group = "%u";
00347                                         $range = "SameWeek";
00348                                         break;
00349                                 case "DAY":
00350                                 default:
00351                                         $redat = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00352                                         $start = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00353                                         $stop  = "DATE_SUB( NOW(), INTERVAL $offset DAY )";
00354                                         $group = "%j";
00355                                         $range = "SameDay";
00356                                         break;
00357                                 }
00358 
00359                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( $redat, '$group' ) AS $range, ";
00360                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( $start , '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Von, ";
00361                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( $stop , '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Bis, ";
00362                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( IFNULL( SUM( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ), 0 ) ) as Stunden, ";
00363                         $query .= "IF( bookid = NULL, 0, COUNT( bookid ) ) AS Besuche FROM tr_bookings ";
00364                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' AND ";
00365                         $query .= "DATE( stamp_1 ) >= DATE( $start ) AND DATE( stamp_1 ) <= DATE( $stop );";
00366 
00367                         $array = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_all($query);
00368 
00369                         // future use, if multiple row read implemented
00370                         if ($limit > 1)
00371                                 {
00372                                         return $array;
00373                                 }
00374 
00375                         return $array[0];
00376                 }

00389                 protected function show_last_bookings($limit=10)
00390                 {
00391                         $query  = "SELECT COUNT( stamp_1 ) AS total FROM tr_bookings ";
00392                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' GROUP BY mid;";
00393                         $entry  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00394 
00395                         $plink = new PageLink($entry["total"]);
00396 
00397                         $query  = "SELECT DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%d.%m.%Y' ) AS Datum, ";
00398                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( stamp_1, '%T Uhr' ) AS Gekommen, ";
00399                         $query .= "DATE_FORMAT( stamp_2, '%T Uhr' ) AS Gegangen, ";
00400                         $query .= "SEC_TO_TIME( UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_2 ) - UNIX_TIMESTAMP( stamp_1 ) ) AS Anwesend ";
00401                         $query .= "FROM tr_bookings ";
00402                         $query .= "WHERE mid = '".$_SESSION["_UserData"]["mid"]."' ";
00403                         $query .= "ORDER BY stamp_1 DESC ".$plink->get_query_limit();
00404 
00405                         $book = $this->query2table($query,"last_bookings");
00406                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--HISTORY_DATA-->",$book);
00407                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("index.html", "<!--HISTORY_PAGE_LINK-->",$plink);
00408                 }

00417                 protected function show_user_table($limit=10)
00418                 {
00419                         $query  = "SELECT COUNT( email ) AS total FROM tr_users;";
00420                         $entry  = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query_first($query);
00421 
00422                         $plink = new PageLink($entry["total"]);
00423 
00424                         $query  = "SELECT u.mid AS MitarbeiterID, u.email AS Email, ";
00425                         $query .= "u.firstname AS Vorname, u.lastname AS Nachname, g.groupname AS Gruppe ";
00426                         //$query .= "IF( b.stamp_2 = NULL, 'Nein', 'Ja' ) AS Anwesend ";
00427                         $query .= "FROM tr_users u ";
00428                         //$query .= "LEFT JOIN tr_bookings b USING ( mid ) ";
00429                         $query .= "LEFT JOIN tr_groups g USING ( gid ) ";
00430                         $query .= "ORDER BY mid ASC ".$plink->get_query_limit();
00431 
00432                         $users = $this->query2table($query,"user_table");
00433                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("users.html", "<!--USER_TABLE-->",$users);
00434                         $_SESSION["HTML"]->assign("users.html", "<!--USER_PAGE_LINK-->",$plink);
00435                 }

00447                 protected function query2table($query,$id)
00448                 {
00449                         $result = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->query($query);
00450                         $first  = true;
00451                         $dump   = "<table id=\"$id\">";
00452                         while ($row = $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->fetch_array($result))
00453                                 {
00454                                         // append only keys on first line
00455                                         if ($first)
00456                                                 {
00457                                                         $dump .= "<tr><td><b>";
00458                                                         $dump .= implode("</b></td><td><b>", array_keys($row));
00459                                                         $dump .= "</b></td></tr>";
00460                                                         $first = false;
00461                                                 }
00462                                         // append data rows
00463                                         $dump .= "<tr><td>";
00464                                         $dump .= implode("</td><td>", $row);
00465                                         $dump .= "</td></tr>";
00466                                 }
00467                         $_SESSION[$_SESSION["_SqlType"]]->free_result($result);
00468                         if ($first) $dump .= "<tr><td>keine Eintr&auml;ge gefunden...</td></tr>";
00469                         // close table
00470                         $dump  .= "</table>";
00471                         return $dump;
00472                 }

00481                 public function prepare_actions()
00482                 {
00483                         // clean previous errors
00484                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] = "";
00485 
00486                         // save post or get value from "page"
00487                         if (isset($_POST["page"]))
00488                                 {
00489                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = isset($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]) ? $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] : "home";
00490                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = $_POST["page"];
00491                                 }
00492                         else if (isset($_GET["page"]))
00493                                 {
00494                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = isset($_SESSION["_PageID.current"]) ? $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] : "home";
00495                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = $_GET["page"];
00496                                 }
00497                         else
00498                                 {
00499                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.current"] = "home";
00500                                         $_SESSION["_PageID.last"] = "home";
00501                                 }
00502 
00503                         // save post or get value from "action"
00504                         if (isset($_POST["action"]))
00505                                 {
00506                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = $_POST["action"];
00507                                 }
00508                         else if (isset($_GET["action"]))
00509                                 {
00510                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = $_GET["action"];
00511                                 }
00512                         else
00513                                 {
00514                                         $_SESSION["_Action"] = "";
00515                                 }
00516 
00517                         // extend session of user, if valid
00518                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->extend();
00519 
00520                         // try to execute session actions
00521                         try
00522                                 {
00523                                         switch ($_SESSION["_Action"])
00524                                                 {
00525                                                 case "login":
00526                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->login();
00527                                                         break;
00528                                                 case "logout":
00529                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->logout();
00530                                                         break;
00531                                                 case "book":
00532                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->book();
00533                                                         break;
00534                                                 case "update":
00535                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->update();
00536                                                         break;
00537                                                 case "delete":
00538                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->delete();
00539                                                         break;
00540                                                 case "create":
00541                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->create();
00542                                                         break;
00543                                                 case "passwd":
00544                                                         $_SESSION["CLIENT"]->passwd();
00545                                                         break;
00546                                                 case "import":
00547                                                         echo $_SESSION["HTML"]->import();
00548                                                         break;
00549                                                 }
00550                                 }
00551                         catch (Exception $e)
00552                                 {
00553                                         $_SESSION["_Errors"] .= $e->getMessage();
00554                                         $_SESSION["_ErrNo"]   = $e->getCode();
00555                                 }
00556                 }
00557 
00558         }
